features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: We provide all the tools you need to manage digital signatures efficiently.

security.title: Absolute Security
security.description: International standard end-to-end encryption, ensuring safety for all your documents.

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: Access and sign documents from any device, anytime, anywhere.

teamwork.title: Team Collaboration
teamwork.description: Easily share and manage signing workflows in your organization.

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: Fully compliant with all legal regulations on electronic signatures.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Sign multiple documents in seconds, saving maximum time.

multilang.title: Multi-language
multilang.description: Support for Vietnamese and English interface, convenient for all users.

howItWorks.title: Simple Process
howItWorks.subtitle: Just 3 simple steps to start digital signing

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Create a free account in just 1 minute.

step2.title: Upload Document
step2.description: Upload documents to sign (PDF, Word, Excel...).

step3.title: Sign & Send
step3.description: Add your signature and send to others.

hero.title: Sign Documents
hero.subtitle: Safe, fast and legally compliant electronic signing solution. Simplify your workflow today.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Sign up for free today and experience modern digital signing.
